snippet: The death of Jalaluddin Haqqani in 2014 was reported days after the Taliban’s overall leader was confirmed to have died more than two years ago.
abstract: Jalaluddin Haqqani, founder of militant Taliban faction known as Haqqani network, is reported to have been dead for nearly year.

byline.original: By MATTHEW ROSENBERG and IHSANULLAH TIPU MEHSUD
byline.contributor: Matthew Rosenberg reported from Washington, and Ihsanullah Tipu Mehsud from Islamabad, Pakistan. Ben Hubbard contributed reporting from Beirut, Lebanon.

lead_paragraph: The death of Jalaluddin Haqqani in 2014 was reported days after the Taliban’s overall leader was confirmed to have died more than two years ago.

headline.main: Founder of Haqqani Network Is Long Dead, Aide Says
headline.print_headline: Founder of Haqqani Network Is Long Dead, Aide Says
